name: Bitsearch Audio
description: Bitsearch torrent search - searches both Audiobooks (cat 8) and Other Audio (cat 1/sub 1) - Updated Feb 2026

headers.User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/120.0.0.0 Safari/537.36

notes: Updated Feb 2026: Changed from category 8 to category 1/subCategory 1
Category 1/subCategory 1 = Other Audio (where most audiobooks are indexed)
Category 8 = Audiobooks had very few results
Magnet links are available directly on search results
Title in h3 > a, size after fa-download icon
Seeds in span.text-green-600, leechers in span.text-red-600
